title: 4C/ID Model-Based Professional Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and comprehension of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Personalized language training utilizing real-time online collaboration tools and digital devices

learning_goals: Learners improve language application skills in professional contexts by over 30% using the four components of the 4C/ID Model (learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, coaching).
Learners perform complex language tasks based on real-world job scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners reduce language usage errors by 50% through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
